abstract: Sardar Biglari, activist investor and head of Steak n Shake, is in a battle with the Michigan Legislature over his hostile bid for Fremont Michigan Insuracorp.
snippet: Sardar Biglari, activist investor and head of Steak n Shake, is in a battle with the Michigan Legislature over his hostile bid for Fremont Michigan Insuracorp.
lead_paragraph: Sardar Biglari, the combative investor who took over Steak n Shake after a widely publicized struggle in 2007 and renamed it Biglari Holdings this month, has another battle on his hands, and this one is with a state legislature.

headline.main: Biglari vs. Michigan: A Form of Protectionism?
